rows.label: tev012201_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012201_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Powell about the residents of NLA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012201_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012201_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Powell if anything is troubling him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012201_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Powell for his thoughts on the Ma-non.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012201_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask Powell about mimeosomes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012201_SEL0061
rows.name: Ask Powell about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012201_MSG0001
rows.name:
Buncha White Whale crew was lost in the attack
that sent us crashing down to this planet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012201_MSG0002
rows.name:
We've made this giant city our home, even though we
ain't got the population for it. And while I'm glad they
found new survivors, they're just a drop in the bucket.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012201_MSG0003
rows.name:
And a lack of people means a lack of customers,
which means Army Pizza ain't selling squat![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012201_MSG0004
rows.name:
And sure, it gives me and the wife plenty of time to
experiment with new recipes while we wait for
customers to show, but that ain't enough.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012201_MSG0005
rows.name:
Can't you and your BLADE pals do something to help
us out? Maybe search for more survivors or something?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012201_MSG0008
rows.name:
I tell ya, running this business ain't getting any easier.
And while all sorts of things have gone wrong,
the biggest problem at this point is traffic.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012201_MSG0009
rows.name:
We at Army Pizza take pride in our promise to deliver
in 30 minutes or less.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012201_MSG0010
rows.name:
But most of the roads to the residential district ain't
even connected yet, so delivery takes way longer than
it should.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012201_MSG0011
rows.name:
My poor wife Camilla is working her butt off already,
and as business improves, her job's gonna become
next to impossible.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012201_MSG0012
rows.name:
I know BLADE's making a lot of progress blazing trails
in the outside world, but what about INSIDE New LA?
Can't they hurry up with these damn roads already?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012201_MSG0020
rows.name:
Sorry, pal. If you're here for the grenade pizza,
you're gonna have to wait.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012201_MSG0021
rows.name:
Oh, you wanted to ask me about the Ma-non?
Well, I don't know much, but I do know one thing...
They absolutely LOVE pizza! Every last one of 'em![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012201_MSG0022
rows.name:
They line up outside my place morning, noon,
and night, asking for pizza like a dying man
begging for a glass of water.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012201_MSG0023
rows.name:
Needless to say, Army Pizza is doing great.
So great, in fact, that I'm in way over my head![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012201_MSG0024
rows.name:
The wife and I have been working nonstop ever since
the Ma-non got here. We never get a break![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012201_MSG0025
rows.name:
But hey, if you've got some time on your hands,
you wanna help me and Camilla out? Maybe put a
little extra spending money in your pocket?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012201_MSG0028
rows.name:
One of our regulars, Gerome, has been causing
trouble with our Ma-non customers.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012201_MSG0029
rows.name:
He sits as far away from the Ma-non as he can
and just...glares at 'em.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012201_MSG0030
rows.name:
I know he had a hard time of it when the xenos
attacked Earth, but hell! We all did![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012201_MSG0031
rows.name:
And no matter how many times I tell him to stow that
baggage and try to get along, he just can't do it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012201_MSG0032
rows.name:
This planet is humanity's last refuge, you know?
I just want him to accept the situation and find some
way to make a life for himself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012201_MSG0040
rows.name:
They don't revive mimeosomes that perish from suicide.
"Out of respect for their wishes," is the official line.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012201_MSG0041
rows.name:
But I know better. They just don't want to use parts
on someone who might...do that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012201_MSG0042
rows.name:
It ain't fair! So long as you're alive, there's always
a chance at a fresh start![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012201_MSG0043
rows.name:
Couldn't we at least give 'em one chance?
One mimeosome revival?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012201_MSG0047
rows.name: Lately, I... Well...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012201_MSG0048
rows.name: Never mind. It's nothing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012201_MSG0049
rows.name: We should talk about Gerome. He doing okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012201_MSG0050
rows.name:
He ain't been to the restaurant much since it started
filling up with Ma-non.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012201_MSG0051
rows.name:
Sure wish he'd stop by. He was one of my few human
regulars, ya know?[ST:wait ]
